meanings.sent1: Her smile showed the dimpliest dimple on her cheek.
meanings.sent2: The baby's face lit up with the dimpliest smile.
meanings.sent3: The dimpliest dimple on his face made everyone around him smile too.
meanings.sent4: The dimpliest dimple on her face was like a tiny secret shared with the world.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the dimpliest dimple I ever saw.

meanings.sent1: The dimpliest dimple on her face was so cute.
meanings.sent2: He had the dimpliest smile that could brighten anyone's day.
meanings.sent3: The dimpliest dimple on the baby's face made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her dimpliest dimple was like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The dimpliest dimple on his cheek was impossible to resist.
